sourcesContent:
<button 
    [ngClass]="{
        'bg-zinc-950 text-zinc-100': isPrimary && !disabled,
        ' text-black border-zinc-950 hover:bg-black hover:text-white': !isPrimary && !disabled,
        '': disabled,
        'border-[1.5px] border-zinc-800 px-4 py-2 rounded-md w-full transition-all': true
    }"
    [disabled]="disabled"
    (click)="clickEvent()"
    [type]="type"
>
    {{text}}
</button>
